programme.title: Black Wednesday 1992
programme.short_synopsis: What could Europe learn from the distribution of power in the US?
programme.medium_synopsis: The UK withdraws from the European Exchange Rate Mechanism after Black Wednesday, and the way in which the US allocates powers and responsibilities to individual states.

programme.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
